title: Love and Sword
overview: The house girl Fang Yi accidentally crossed into the novel she complained about and accidentally met Chu Tianyao, the owner of the cottage in the book. It was Chu Tianyao. After several twists and turns, Fang Yi changed her life against the sky with her own intelligence, and she and Chu Tianyao also healed each other and grew in love. The two finally wrote a beautiful love story.
